languages.text: "Тогда опоздаем на встречу с Эде..." {n}Идира осекается и начинает тяжело кашлять. Ее ноги подкашиваются, кажется, она вот-вот упадет.{/n} "{name}, чего мы ждем?!"
"Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"
languages.original_text: "Тогда опоздаем на встречу с Эде..." {n}Идира осекается и начинает тяжело кашлять. Ее ноги подкашиваются, кажется, она вот-вот упадет.{/n} "{name}, чего мы ждем?!"

traits.locale_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"
"Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"
"Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"
"Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"
"Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

languages.text: “这样的话，我们就会错过和艾德萨德见面的机会——”{n}伊迪拉没等说完话，就剧烈地咳嗽起来。她的膝盖使不上力气，看起来似乎马上就要跌倒在地。{/n}“{name}，咱们还在等什么啊？”
languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: “这样的话，我们就会错过和艾德萨德见面的机会——”{n}伊迪拉没等说完话，就剧烈地咳嗽起来。她的膝盖使不上力气，看起来似乎马上就要跌倒在地。{/n}“{name}，咱们还在等什么啊？”

languages.text: «Entonces perderemos la ocasión de reunirnos con Ede...». {n}Un acceso de tos interrumpe las palabras de Idira. Sus rodillas se doblan y parece estar a punto de caer.{/n} «{name}, ¿a qué esperamos?».
languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces perderemos la ocasión de reunirnos con Ede...». {n}Un acceso de tos interrumpe las palabras de Idira. Sus rodillas se doblan y parece estar a punto de caer.{/n} «{name}, ¿a qué esperamos?».

languages.text: 「それでは、エデルスラドと会うチャンスを…」{n}イディラは言葉を切り上げ、激しく咳き込み始めた。彼女の膝はガクガクして、今にも転びそうになっている。{/n}「{name}、あたいたちは何をぐずぐずしているの？」
languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: 「それでは、エデと会うチャンスを逃すことになる…」{n}イディラは言葉を切り上げ、激しく咳き込み始めた。彼女の膝はガクガクして、今にも転びそうになっている。{/n}「{name}、私たちは何をぐずぐずしているんですか？」
「それでは、エデルスラドと会うチャンスを…」{n}イディラは言葉を切り上げ、激しく咳き込み始めた。彼女の膝はガクガクして、今にも転びそうになっている。{/n}「{name}、あたいたちは何をぐずぐずしているの？」

languages.text: « On n'aurait plus aucune chance de rejoindre Ede... » {n}Une violente quinte de toux interrompt Idira. Ses jambes se dérobent et elle semble sur le point de tomber.{/n} « Qu'est-ce qu'on attend, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: « On n'aurait plus aucune chance de rejoindre Ede... » {n}Une violente quinte de toux interrompt Idira. Ses jambes se dérobent et elle semble sur le point de tomber.{/n} « Qu'est-ce qu'on attend, {name} ? »

languages.text: "Dann verpassen wir unsere Chance auf ein Treffen mit Ede..." {n}Idira bricht ab und hat einen starken Hustenanfall. Sie geht in die Knie und macht den Eindruck, als würde sie gleich umsinken{/n} "{name}, worauf warten wir?"
languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann verpassen wir unsere Chance auf ein Treffen mit Ede..." {n}Idira bricht ab und hat einen starken Hustenanfall. Sie geht in die Knie und macht den Eindruck, als würde sie gleich umsinken{/n} "{name}, worauf warten wir?"

languages.text: "İyi de o zaman Edelthrad ile buluşma şans..." {n}İdira'nın sesi bir anda kesiliyor ve şiddetle öksürmeye başlıyor. Dizleri bükülüyor, düşecekmiş gibi duruyor.{/n} "{name}, ne bekliyoruz?"
languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} "{name}, what are we waiting for?"

traits.locale_text: "İyi de o zaman Edelthrad ile buluşma şans..." {n}İdira'nın sesi bir anda kesiliyor ve şiddetle öksürmeye başlıyor. Dizleri bükülüyor, düşecekmiş gibi duruyor.{/n} "{name}, ne bekliyoruz?"

languages.original_text: "Then we'll miss our chance to meet up with Ede—" {n}Idira breaks off and starts coughing violently. Her knees buckle, and she looks like she is about to fall.{/n} ", what are we waiting for?"
